attributes.action: Recognize EU Covid vaccine certificates to enable reduced quarantine rules
attributes.additional_details: To enable the families of UK citizens to travel more easily to the UK to be able to see them. They have been separated for more than 18 months in some cases - a devastating impact on relationships, loneliness and individual freedom.
attributes.background: Enable vaccinated people holding certificates from the EU to be able to travel from amber countries with the same conditions as UK citizens. Currently to travel as a family from the UK costs potentially 1000 pounds in testing and involves minimum 6 day quarantine.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the below petition we currently have open on this topic:

Seek to agree upon equivalence of NHS Covid pass and European Covid Green Pass
